experience.title: APM Fellow
experience.description: ~ Secured a place in the Top 100 in APM Fellowship.~ Conducted User Research on Gen Z through 20+ 1:1 Interviews and a survey with 60+ respondents to understand user pain points.~ Designed a feature – YT Coins, to help users reduce the advertisements consumption, by introducing Gamified Coin Economy. Created a Landing Page and a Prototype to explain Value Proposition.~ Validated the solution to understanding desirability and the feature is rated 4.8/5 by Gen-Z users.
experience.description_html: ~ Secured a place in the Top 100 in APM Fellowship.~ Conducted User Research on Gen Z through 20+ 1:1 Interviews and a survey with 60+ respondents to understand user pain points.~ Designed a feature – YT Coins, to help users reduce the advertisements consumption, by introducing Gamified Coin Economy. Created a Landing Page and a Prototype to explain Value Proposition.~ Validated the solution to understanding desirability and the feature is rated 4.8/5 by Gen-Z users. <!---->

experience.title: Industrial Trainee
experience.description: ~I completed the training/internship at the VK-7 underground mine in the Kothagudem area of the Singareni Coalfields.~Submitted a report observing all the works with 43250 Tonnes monthly production & 585 daily employment.~Assisted a team of 10 workers for 100 tonnes coal production cycle in 2 working sections.~Observed an 18000 kg coal production panel with 16 workers, including machinery for two weeks.
